entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 14 April 2023
